name: Quip Invoice Frontend Extension
author: Innovative Solutions

sections.description: Display Quip invoices on your frontpage for clients in a page or post. Any feature ideas please let me know.
sections.installation:
1. Upload to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Use shortcodes to display client quotes [quip-quotes-page] and invoices [quip-invoices-page]
sections.faq:
Installation Instructions

  1. Upload to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Use shortcodes to display client quotes [quip-quotes-page] and invoices [quip-invoices-page]

Does this work with both the free and premium versions of Quip?

Yes
sections.changelog:
1.0
Needed a frontend solution for Quip Invoices Pro, plugin created
